title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3431/85 of 5 December 1985 on annual updating of the country nomenclature for the external trade statistics of the Community and statistics of trade between Member States
header:
COMMISSCOMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 3431/85
of 5 December 1985
on annual updating of the country nomenclature for the external trade statistics of the Community and statistics of trade between Member States
THETHE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The version valid on 1 January 1986 of the country nomenclature for the external trade statistics of the Community and statistics of trade between Member States is set out in the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1986.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 5 December 1985.
For the Commission
Alois PFEIFFER
Member of the Commission
((1) OJ No L 183, 14. 7. 1975, p. 3.
(2) OJ No L 329, 22. 12. 1977, p. 3.
(3) OJ No L 371, 30. 12. 1982, p. 7.
(4) OJ No L 361, 24. 12. 1983, p. 31.
(5) OJ No L 291, 8. 11. 1984, p. 25.
ANNEX
COUNTRY NOMENCLATURE FOR THE EXTERNAL TRADE STATISTICS OF THE COMMUNITY AND STATISTICS OF TRADE BETWEEN MEMBER STATES
(Version valid with effect from 1 January 1986)
